snippet: Chinese social media users have been in an uproar over a 2-year-old killed by an S.U.V. while her mother was distracted by a smartphone....
abstract: Chinese toddler killed after running in front of SUV while her mother was focused on cell phone prompts grief and outrage across China's social media over nation's perceived obsession with smartphones.

byline.original: By OWEN GUO and MIKE IVES
byline.contributor: Owen Guo reported from Beijing, and Mike Ives from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: Chinese social media users have been in an uproar over a 2-year-old killed by an S.U.V. while her mother was distracted by a smartphone.

headline.main: A Toddler Dies as Her Mother Checks Her Phone, and China Wrings Its Hands
headline.print_headline: Mother on Phone as Child Dies, Moving China Toward Reflection
